resources.string: Terms and Conditions of Use | ArkOwn

1. Definitions

"Arkown" shall mean all ArkOwn applications and services. 

"Server" shall mean the software and/or hardware that ArkOwn shall be provided direct access to, as well as all hardware, software, and other means of connection necessary to gain access indirectly.

"User" shall mean any third-party person, company, or service that interacts with ArkOwn.

 2. Authority

By enabling and using "Proxy" access for the specified Server, you identify yourself as the lawful owner and/or an official administrator of said Server with authorization to allow ArkOwn access to the Server.

You agree to allow ArkOwn to store sensitive information about your Server on a remote database, including, but not limited to, authentication credentials, access logs, and Server status.

You agree to allow ArkOwn to query and control your Server using the the commands and User access rights that you maintain.

You agree to allow ArkOwn to provide remote access to, control of, and information about your Server to the Users that you specify, based on the permissions and commands that you specifiy.

 3. Disclaimer of Warranty / Limitation of Liability

You accept that ArkOwn applications and services are provided on an AS IS basis, without warranties or conditions of any kind, either express or implied.

You accept that you are solely responsible for determining the appropriateness of using and providing Users access to your Server and assume any and all risks associated with your exercise of usage under these terms.

You accept all responsibility for remote access to your Server by ArkOwn, both authorized and unauthorized.

You accept that ArkOwn shall not be liable to you for damages, including any direct, indrect, special, incidental, or consequential damages of any character arising as a result of allowing access to your Server.

By clicking the "agree" button, you acknowledge that you have read, fully understand, and agree to all terms specified above.
